Text.Page:
Hey! Want to do something different today? {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne}'s been bugging me about going out to kill some things, and I'm like, ewâ€”I'm a city girl! Not interested.

But I'm sure the task is perfect for a hero like you. Talk to {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} for the gruesome particulars.

Doesn't like to kill things? Can you believe she's castanic? What a strange girl.

Well, I know you aren't squeamish. I need you to do some hunting for the Hands. It will require you to travel, kill some nagas, and bring back body parts.

Oh boy! fresh skin, claws, and bone...yuck!

You had this in your pack that whole trip, and you didn't vomit once?

Did you at least wash your hands first? {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} has your payment.

We need things like hide, bone, and claws, all from nagas. Don't ask.

Hunt the {@LinkCreature:10#8#naga battlemasters} on {@Rgn:10001#Serpentis Isle} and bring back some body parts. The Hands will put them to good use.

Gross. I mean, thanks!

{@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} will pay you for your work.

We need things like carapace, bone, and claws, all from nagas. Don't ask.

Hunt the {@LinkCreature:10#16#naga clawriders} on {@Rgn:10001#Serpentis Isle} and bring back some body parts. The Hands will put them to good use.

What is that smell? I swear, {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} is having you deliver this stuff here just to punish me.

Talk to that old bag if you want your payment.

We need things like carapace, bone, and claws, all from nagas. Don't ask.

Hunt the {@LinkCreature:10#17#naga clawmasters} on {@Rgn:10001#Serpentis Isle} and bring back some body parts. The Hands will put them to good use.

Ugh, that's gross. At least it doesn't smell...yet.

{@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} has payment for you.

We need things like carapace, bone, and claws, all from nagas. Don't ask.

Hunt the {@LinkCreature:10#18#naga leviathans} on {@Rgn:10001#Serpentis Isle} and bring back some body parts. The Hands will put them to good use.
